dialogue.speaker: Speaker 1
text: You open your packs to have a second breakfast, only to find that it is nowhere in sight.
Someone accuses a young llama sneaking around last night.
Reflecting back, he was known for his mischievous nature.

dialogue.speaker: Speaker 1
text: Your party continues at the loss of that llama, yet the next day some more food goes missing.
You backtrack to where you left the llama and recruit him back into the party.
Fortunately for you, no food goes missing the next day.
The culprit must have learned their lesson after fearing expulsion from the herd.

dialogue.speaker: Speaker 1
text: You investigate the matter and challenge the accusation until concrete proof is found.
You find out it was actually him.
You discipline the llama by abstaining him of second breakfast for five days.
That night, the llama steals some more food and runs away from the herd.
